Aug. 15, 1891 D Thornton Hough Contest
Thornton Hough Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
thornton-hough-contest
None
Thornton Hall, Thornton Hough, Wirral Garden Fete at Thornton Hall, home of the Lever family, owners of Port Sunlight, for their employees etc. Prizes totalled Â£30 The adjudicator described Birkenhead Mission's performance as "the worst piece he had ever heard at a contest of the sort"! 7 bands competed.
Feb. 8, 2013, 10:45 a.m. July 4, 2018, 10:53 p.m.
1 Skelmersdale Old William Rimmer The Bohemian Girl [unknown arranger]
2 Oakland Street Wesleyan (Widnes) William Rimmer
3 Gossage Soap Works John James Brady
4 Tranmere Gleam Mr. Leddow
5 Warrington United T. Meredith
6 Birkenhead Borough Unknown
7 Birkenhead Mission Unknown
